field.name: help
field.p: Click here to define a new sales team.
Use sales team to organize your different salespersons or departments into separate teams. Each team will work in its own list of opportunities.

field.name: product_uom_qty
field.on_change: product_id_change(parent.pricelist_id, product_id, product_uom_qty, product_uom, product_uos_qty, product_uos, name, parent.partner_id, False, False, parent.date_order, False, parent.fiscal_position, True, context)

field.name: product_id
field.on_change: product_id_change_with_wh(parent.pricelist_id,product_id,product_uom_qty,False,product_uos_qty,False,name,parent.partner_id, False, True, parent.date_order, product_packaging, parent.fiscal_position, False, parent.warehouse_id, context)

field.name: product_id

tree.colors: blue:state == 'draft';grey:state == 'cancel';red:state not in ('cancel', 'done') and delivery_date < current_date
blue:state == 'draft';grey:state == 'cancel';red:state not in ('cancel', 'validated') and delivery_date < current_date
